Search & Sell

JEP Heroes is not only about high-quality customer interactions…we love technology…and e-commerce.

With our vast e-commerce experience we know that on average about 25% of your site visitors will start their journey with a search request on your site. With our Search & Sell Technology we are able to dramatically increase sales conversion for these visitors.

Did you ever calculate the potential revenue gain, in case you would be able to increase the conversion on site search?

Our unique Search & Sell Technology can be fully integrated with your existing e-commerce store. We have extensions ready for Magento Commerce, WooCommerce and others.

This is how the magic works:
When a site visitors submits a search request on your site, our technology will plot a revenue potential against the search term. If the revenue potential is low (for example it is a low order value item), the visitor will see the regular site search results page. In case the search term is however of high value (expensive item), a pro-active chat will be initiated. Our customer care Heroes will provide the pre-sales support to the site visitor and try to close the deal for you.

Our Search & Sell Technology performance can be measured in detail and as such we are able to calculate clear ROI (Return-On-Investment) for you.

If you want to learn how our Search & Sell Technology can impact your bottom line financials, contact us today for a demo or proposal.

Request a proposal
